ModMetaData.name: Squad Attack Even With Same Weapon
ModMetaData.author: Doug
ModMetaData.description:
Github link is https://github.com/dougbenham/Rimworld-SquadAttackEvenWithSameWeapon
Currently if you have a squad of pawns with the same primary weapon, plus they have some combination of Eagle Eye power and Mini-turret Gun accessory, the attack gizmo doesn't work. This will fix it so that the squad attack command is used.
